alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 1:15PM MST until January 12 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 PM MST FRIDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Heavy snow and gusty winds expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches, with locally higher amounts. Winds gusting 25 to 35 mph at times. * WHERE...Jackson Hole. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 8 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
